title: PUMA Men's 8 Pack Low Cut Socks
description: TRENDING STYLE: No more sock show with low-top sneakers or boat shoes. We've mastered the low cut sock design with the Low Cut Socks from PUMA. These low cut socks provide just enough coverage to stay hidden and stay up, while offering a touch of style.

BUILT FOR COMFORT: The Low Cut Socks from PUMA are perfect for everyday wear, featuring arch support and a cushioned footbed to cradle your foot in comfort. These socks are made for walking, jumping, biking, and everything in between.

GREAT FIT AND FEEL: The Low Cut Socks from PUMA are designed to go the distance with comfort in mind. Featuring a seamless look and feel, and with an anatomical shape and stitch size for fabric stability throughout. Fits sock size: 10-13.

PERFORMANCE MATERIAL: With a combination of 98% polyester and 2% spandex, the PUMA Low Cut Socks are super comfortable and easy to care for. Machine wash warm, tumble low dry at a low temperature, and wash with similar colors.

VALUE PACK: The essential 8-Pack PUMA Low Cut Socks is an excellent choice for high-performance activity and all-day comfort. They're sure to become your new fave low cut socks, which is precisely why we recommend an 8-pack strategy.

No more sock show with low-top sneakers or boat shoes. We've mastered the design with the Low Cut Socks from PUMA. These low cut socks provide just enough coverage to stay hidden and stay up, while offering a touch of style. With next-level comfort, these socks deserve a permanent place in your drawer. Featuring arch support and a cushioned footbed to cradle your foot in comfort, these socks are made for walking, jumping, biking, and everything in between. There's a PUMA big cat logo to punch up the look and show the world that you're serious about your sport. For those who love a little more ankle freedom, the humble low cut sock shouldn't be overlooked. Assembled into a convenient 8-pack because these will become your favorite low cut socks. And everyone wants more of their favorite socks ready to wear.
